# nw_interface_t

**Type Alias**

An interface that a network connection uses to send and receive data.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias nw_interface_t = any OS_nw_interface
```

## Network Interface Types

- **nw_interface_type_t**: Types of network interfaces, based on their link layer media types.

## Inspecting Interfaces

- **nw_interface_get_type(_:)**: Accesses the type of the interface, such as Wi-Fi or Loopback.
- **nw_interface_get_name(_:)**: Accesses the name of the interface.
- **nw_interface_get_index(_:)**: Accesses the system interface index associated with the interface.
